mods.abstract: Three color window card (red and green on split fountain, red to yellow) announcing the grand opening of Willie's Place with Willie Nelson and Asleep at the Wheel at Carl's Corner on February 24. Poster features a metal photoplate of Willie Nelson. Poster is a limited edition of 500.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
